name: BinCraft X
description:
BinCraft X is a small 3D first-person survival game where your goal is to prevent the world from freezing by melting all the ice cubes.

This project served as an exercise for using Unity engine, as well as trying to implement some new things. It's not polished, but it's fully playable (has a beginning and an end).

Github repository: https://github.com/wingedadventurer/BinCraft-X
